# Setting a repository up for sharing.

Ensure your repository has all the files required for sharing on GitHub.

- [ ] Create a `README.md`
- [ ] Add an appropriate `LICENSE.md`
- [ ] Add `CONTRIBUTING.md`
- [ ] Add a `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md`

***

## Guidelines
